EmailTemplate.name: What are my Debit/ATM card limits? (BofI, Advisor, UFB and Bank X):
EmailTemplate.subject: What are my Debit/ATM card limits? (BofI, Advisor, UFB and Bank X):
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The daily limits for ATM/Debit cards are:
- Cash withdrawal from an ATM using an ATM card - $1010.00 - Cash withdrawal from an ATM using a Visa® Debit card - $1010.00 - Point-of-sale transaction using your Visa® Debit card - $2,500.00
We appreciate your business and commit to providing superior Banking products, support and services.
